Klaytn 네트워크 기반 PXL 출금이 가능한 거래소에서 이 지갑 주소: Send money to this wallet address from Klaytn network-based PXL withdrawals.
Klaytn 네트워크를 지원하는 블록체인 지갑에 보유한 PXL을 이 지갑: The PXL held in the blockchain wallet supporting the Klaytn network is transferred to this wallet address.
입금을 지원하는 거래소 및 지갑 서비스: Exchange and wallet services that support deposits
이더리움(ERC-20) 기반 네트워크의 PXL 토큰은 입금하실 수 없습니: PXL tokens from Ethereum (ERC-20)-based networks cannot be deposited.
You cannot deposit tokens other than PXL tokens.
다른 네트워크 또는 다른 토큰 입금 시 발생하는 오류 및 손실은 복구해: We do not recover errors and losses that occur when depositing other networks or tokens.
Only an integer greater than 1 can be entered.
출금을 지원하는 거래소 및 지갑 서비스: Exchange and wallet services that support withdrawals
PXL 토큰은 Klaytn 블록체인 네트워크를 통해 전송되며, 전송이 시: The PXL token is sent over the Claytn Blockchain network and cannot be canceled when the transfer begins.
입력한 출금 수량 및 출금 주소 오입력으로 인한 피해는 픽션이 책임지지: Piction is not responsible for the damage caused by the quantity of withdrawals entered and the typographical error of the withdrawal address.
Remittances to exchanges that do not support the Klaytn network are not possible.
네트워크 상황 및 거래소의 정책에 따라 시간이 좀 더 소요될 수 있습니다: Depending on your network situation and your exchange policy, it may take a little longer.
누구에게나 팬은 있다, 창작자를 응원하는 새로운 방법: Everybody has a fan, a New way to cheer Creators
픽션과 함께 새로운 모험을 하실 창작자를 찾습니다: Find creators to take on new adventures with Piction
픽션 네트워크는 창작자의 다양한 창작활동을 후원 할 수 있는 오픈 생태계: Piction Network is an open ecosystem that can support various creative activities of creators.
콘텐츠가 만들어지는 과정을 팬과 함께 응원하고 즐기는 실험적인 시도를 함: You can participate in an experimental attempt to cheer and enjoy the content creation process with your fans.
일러스트, 웹툰, 소설, 블로그, 사진 어떤 콘텐츠도 상관없습니다. 콘텐: Illustrations, Webtoons, Novels, Blogs, Photos, any content is fine. The content is endless.
내가 좋아하는 것을 시작해보세요. 픽션에선 어떤것이든 당신의 이야기를 좋: Start what I like. In Piction, anyone who likes your story can be sponsored.
흥미진진한 웹툰부터 존잘 일러스트, 특별한 소재를 담은 웹소설, 지난달에: From interesting webtoons to handsome illustrations, web novels with special subjects, travel to Europe last month, pictures of my favorite figures,
사랑스런 반려동물의 모습, 취미로 하는 코스프레 까지 무엇이든 가능합니다: lovely pets, and hobby cosplay are all possible. Even your secret diary...
당신의 이야기를 함께 나누고 싶은 사람과 공유하고, 그 가치를 후원 받을: Share your story with the person you want to share it with, and get its value sponsored.
어떤 이야기를 하고 싶으신가요?: What would you like to talk about?
Whatever the theme of creation is good. Start with my favorite content. The other creators,
what other creators are talking about.
하고 싶은 프로젝트를 정했다면: If you've chosen the project you want to do,
만들어주세요. 첫 포스트로 어떤 이야기를 할 것인지 알려주시면 프로젝트가: If you tell me what you're going to say in the first post, the project will look more attractive.
나의 프로젝트를 알리고 구독자 5명을 모아주세요: Please inform my project and collect 5 subscribers
기존에 창작활동을 하시고 있었다면 픽션에서 새로운 시도를 시작 했음을 알: If you've been doing creative work before, please let me know that you've started a new attempt at Piction. If you share and let me know the link to my project on Instagram, Twitter, and blogs, more fans will know.
후원 플랜을 신청해주세요: Please apply for a sponsorship plan.
구독자 5명을 달성하면 하고 후원 플랜을 신청하세요. 팬들로부터 직접 P: When you reach 5 subscribers, apply for a sponsorship plan. A sponsoring plan will be opened to directly receive PXL from fans. You will be given the opportunity to develop a sponsorship plan through a separate application.
이제 여러분의 차례입니다. 꾸준하게 이야기를 들려주세요. 반드시 내 프로: Now it's your turn. Please tell the story steadily. There will surely be fans who like my project. The world is wide and the stories are diverse. Anyone has a fan.
Start a new creative activity at Piction, Welcome creators.
시간이 남았으면 더 알아보기: Learn more if you have time
왜 블록체인 코인(PXL)으로 후원을 받아야 하나요?: Why do I need to be sponsored by Blockchain Coin (PXL)?
픽션은 블록체인 네트워크에서 동작합니다. 블록체인은 투명하고 위변조가 불: Piction works on blockchain networks. Blockchain operates in a transparent and non-falsifying way, making it possible for anyone to check the flow of sponsorship transparently, and to create a fair flow of a portion of the sponsored money back into the ecosystem. In addition, Smart Contracttra uses a program to omit the complicated intermediate settlement process and allows the sponsor to be delivered quickly and accurately.
비슷한 다른 플랫폼도 많은데 왜 픽션을 해야하나요?: There are many other similar platforms, so why do you need to Piction?
픽션은 창작자님들의 다양한 창작 실험을 지지합니다. 새로운 시도는 언제나: Piction supports various creative experiments by creators. This is because new attempts are always welcome, and we are ready to support the Piction as well as the cheers we receive. The Piction Ecosystem runs the Ecosystem Growth Fund to encourage more creators' creative activities. This fund is used to support various creative activities.
